title: Got an s and no token? a known bug or just me?
body: just got an S in the ranked flex queue with a level 5 and got no token :( any help would be great :)

replies.body:
Here's a few reasons why you might not earn a chest:

* You may have already earned a chest with the champion you're playing â€” you may only earn a chest once from each champion. This cap resets each season.
* You may have reached the chest limit for the week.
* You may have been punished by a behavior system recently, meaning you won't be able to earn rewards from Hextech Crafting.

Hextech Crafting Guide FAQ [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).

{{champion:17}}
Not a chest, a mastery token for a level 5 champion

> [{quoted}](name=dirtyblonde,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=KY7fpxex,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-13T22:24:57.236+0000)
>
> Not a chest, a mastery token for a level 5 champion

Whoops, my bad. Have you tried checking if the token shows up in the Legacy client? You can launch the Legacy client by using the button on the login page.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

If it's not there, try submitting a ticket to Riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

{{champion:17}}
